title: Home Assistant + Matter
summary: The open-source smart home hub that finally makes all your devices work together. With Matter support, brand lock-in is dead.
content:
Home Assistant is the open-source brain of a truly smart home. It runs locally on your network, connects to over 2,000 integrations, and gives you a single dashboard for everything — lights, thermostats, cameras, locks, sensors, and more. No cloud required, no subscription fees.

The addition of Matter support is a game-changer. Matter is a universal smart home protocol backed by Apple, Google, Amazon, and Samsung. Devices that support Matter work across all platforms automatically. Home Assistant's Matter integration means you can buy any Matter-certified device and it just works — no more checking compatibility lists.

The automation engine is where Home Assistant really shines. Set up rules like "turn off all lights when everyone leaves" or "start the robot vacuum when nobody's home" using a visual editor or YAML. Combine it with voice assistants, presence detection, and energy monitoring for a home that truly runs itself.
